soccer.common

Class Vector2d

  • java.lang.Object
    • soccer.common.Vector2d

  • public class Vector2d
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class provides 2D vector calculation.
    Author:
    Yu Zhang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vector2d()
      Constructs a default 2D vector set to (0,0).
      Vector2d(double x, double y)
      Constructs a 2D vector set to (x,y).
      Vector2d(Vector2d vec)
      Constructs a 2D vector, which has the same value as the other Vector vec.

      • times

        public void times(double value)
        Changes the size of the vector. If the value is negative, the direction is changed 180 degrees.
        Parameters:
        value - the value being multiplied by both x, y coordinates.
